title: Settee (part of a set including four armchairs)
description: Settee (part of a set including four armchairs); Jacques-Jean-Baptiste Tilliard (French, 1723 - 1798, master 1752); Paris, France; about 1770 - 1775; Carved and gilded walnut.  Modern silk velvet upholstery; 120.3 x 229.9 x 94.6 cm (47 3/8 x 90 1/2 x 37 1/4 in.); 78.DA.99.5; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
